title: Firecracker icon wont redeem?
body: Riot, why can't I redeem my firecracker icon from purchasing the firecracker Jinx figure? I bought it on the day of release and I am still unable to redeem it. Anything you can tell me?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you receiving an error when attempting to redeem your icon? If the code has expired or is showing as invalid you should [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can help with these issues.

You should include proof of purchase with your ticket (A copy of your invoice) and the invalid code.
so I show them the order number?
Yes, or a screenshot of your invoice.
